page.title: 05SATURDAY IN BRANT BROUGHTON
page.content: On Saturdays I usually wake up at about 6am and read a book until 7am. Then I get out my model soldiers or play something until 7.30am when my dad brings in a cup of tea.I have breakfast at 8am(cornflakes or a slice of toast).After breakfast I watch The Wide Awake Club until 10.30am when I play with friends.I usually have lunch at 12.30pm.This is a snack such as salad,crisps,rolls and meat.After lunch I either watch a film or go out to play until 5.30pm when I come in for tea, consisting of fishfingers and chips and angel delight or mousse. After tea I watch TV until 8.30pm.I go to bed at 9pm and read until about 9.30pm.
